Package controller

Class AddCustomerViewController

java.lang.Object
controller.AddCustomerViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddCustomerViewController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The AddCustomerViewController class is responsible for managing the customer creation process in the application's user interface. It provides methods for setting up and controlling various UI elements, handling user interactions, and saving customer information to the database.

  • Method Details

    • setCustomerCountryCombo

      public void setCustomerCountryCombo() throws SQLException
      Initializes the customerCountryCombo in the UI, populating it with country data from the database. It also handles the selection change event to dynamically load divisions based on the selected country.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs during country data retrieval.

    • OnActionSaveCustomer

      public void OnActionSaveCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException
      Handles the "Save Customer" button action, validating user input and saving the customer to the database.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs during customer insertion.
      IOException

    • OnActionCancelCustomer

      public void OnActionCancelCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the "Cancel" button action, clearing input fields and navigating back to the previous screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during navigation.

    • clearFields

      public void clearFields()
      Clears input fields and resets combo boxes to their default states.
